# Kautilya Educational Academy, Dewas - Website Project

## Project Overview
This is a professional school website for Kautilya Educational Academy, Dewas built with HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript.

## Tech Stack
- HTML5 (semantic markup)
- CSS3 (modern responsive design)
- Vanilla JavaScript (no frameworks)
- Mobile-first responsive design

## Project Structure
```
/
├── index.html              # Home page
├── /pages                  # All subpages
│   ├── about.html
│   ├── academics.html
│   ├── admissions.html
│   ├── campus.html
│   ├── student-life.html
│   ├── news.html
│   ├── gallery.html
│   └── contact.html
├── /assets
│   ├── /css               # Stylesheets
│   ├── /js                # JavaScript files
│   ├── /images            # Image assets
│   └── /pdf               # PDF documents
└── README.md
```

## Design Guidelines
- Color Palette: Deep Blue (#1a365d), Gold (#d4a84b), White (#ffffff), Light Gray (#f7f9fc)
- Typography: System fonts for performance
- Style: Clean, professional, education-focused

## Development Notes
- All pages use consistent header/footer
- Navigation is sticky with dropdown menus
- Mobile hamburger menu for responsive design
- Images are placeholders - replace with actual school photos
